LanguageData.GlassBatch.label: Glass Batch
LanguageData.GlassBatch.description: Raw Glass Batch that was made from Sand. It would be more useful when it is refined into Glass Frames.
LanguageData.Glass.label: Glass Frame
LanguageData.Glass.description: A transparent material that is quite popular despite being fragile. Glass is produced from Glass Batch, which is made from Sand.
LanguageData.ReinforcedGlass.label: Reinforced Glass Frame
LanguageData.ReinforcedGlass.description: A stronger version of Glass Frames that is harder to work with, but has more potential uses.
